Playing The Game: 1. Play cards in sequential order from lowest to highest, where Ace is high and two is wild. 2. First person to go out (have no cards in hand) gets the title 'President' and gets two points 3. Next person to go out gets the title 'Vice-President' and gets one point 4. First person to get to 11 points wins 5. Playing doubles, triples, or four of a kind is legal 6. Two's act as the highest card if played alone, but if played in anything more act like the other cards played with them
Ranking 1. First player to get rid of their cards will receive the ranking of President 2. Second player to get rid of their cards will receive the ranking of Vice President 3. Third player to get rid of their cards will receive the ranking of Vice Scum 4. Player with cards left
To Select A Card or Set of Cards to Play: 1. Select on the cards that you want to play a. When card is selected, it will become shaded b. To deselect card, click on it again and it will become unshaded 2. Press the Play Button a. If card set is not higher than the current set or the cards are not of the same value, then an “Invalid Move” message will display on your screen b. If it isn’t your turn yet, then a “Not Your Turn” message will display on your screen c. If able to play, your card set will display in the current set pile in the center
To Order Your Hand from Lowest to Highest Value: 1. When it’s your turn, select the “Order Cards” button
To Pass Your Turn: 1. When it’s your turn, select the “Pass” button a. It will pass your turn and move on or display a “Not Your Turn” message
To Leave Game 1. Select the “Leave Game” button NOTE: You can leave the game without disrupting the play, but if you’re the host the game will end.
